ovdesc.p: This screen is used to store the accounts of correspondent banks with which the processing bank shares a LORO or NOSTRO relationship.
1) This GUI is used to update the store table PPL.LORONOSTROACCOUNT
2) Each multivalue set defined in this GUI will be updated as a seperate record in PPL.LORONOSTROACCOUNT. The store table is company specific and is used in the credit account determination process.
